# Rules for LLM bots accessing the site

User-agent: *

Allow: /
Allow: /rails/
Allow: /catalog/
Allow: /tupik/

Allow: /krestovina/
Allow: /8739/
Allow: /mvsp/
Allow: /rails/r65/
Allow: /rulsovye-izdeliya/
Allow: /naplavka-krestovin/
Allow: /naplavka-ostryakov/
Allow: /calculator/
Allow: /calculator-kr/
Allow: /tproduct/
Allow: /*.jpg$
Allow: /*.jpeg$

Crawl-delay: 10
